ProjectTitle: Connected speech as an expression of brain health
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/05/2023
The  DMP for a C1 project should use the BOF-IOF DMP template using dmponline: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp 
Whilst the content of your current DMP is already good, you'll notice that the template asks for information on further topics, such as documentation/metadata for your datasets; and more details on archiving and data sharing.  Also the ethics / gdpr approval numbers should be included.

14/06/2022
The  DMP for a C1 project should use the Internal Funds DMP template in KULeuven DMPonline: https://dmponline.kuleuven.be .
Whilst the content of your current DMP is already good, you'll notice that the template asks for information on further topics, such as documentation/metadata for your datasets; and more details on archiving and data sharing.  Also the ethics / gdpr approval numbers should be included.
label: good with suggestions
